name: Dinari MCD
description: The Dinari MCD dShares token (MCD.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in McDonald's Corporation, one of the world’s largest fast-food restaurant chains. Each MCD.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding McDonald’s share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, MCD.d provides investors with seamless access to McDonald’s stock, enabling 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity. This token bridges the gap between traditional equity investments and blockchain innovation.
